paragraphs.body: Sno Cone Studios was a comic-based company that worked in coloring and lettering. Before it closed in 2006, Sno Cone Studios colored three ${link_0} of the Avatar franchise.
paragraphs.text: Sno Cone Studios was a comic-based company that worked in coloring and lettering. Before it closed in 2006, Sno Cone Studios colored three comic books of the Avatar franchise.
